desktops.name: Dell Inspiron 3891
desktops.small_summary: Powerful desktop for home and office use.
desktops.description: The Dell Inspiron 3891 is powered by an Intel Core i5-10400 processor with 6 cores and 12 threads, providing smooth multitasking performance. It features 8GB DDR4 RAM (expandable up to 32GB), a 512GB NVMe SSD for fast boot times, and Intel UHD Graphics 630 for everyday computing needs. This desktop runs Windows 11 Home and includes built-in Wi-Fi 6, Bluetooth 5.1, multiple USB 3.1 and USB 2.0 ports, HDMI, DisplayPort, and an SD card reader. The sleek black chassis ensures space efficiency. Package includes a wired keyboard and mouse. 1-year limited hardware warranty with on-site support.

desktops.name: Lenovo ThinkCentre M90t
desktops.description: The Lenovo ThinkCentre M90t is a professional-grade desktop featuring a 10th Gen Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB DDR4 RAM, and a 512GB SSD for optimal performance. Comes with Intel UHD Graphics 630, USB-C, DisplayPort, Wi-Fi 6, and Bluetooth 5.0. Preloaded with Windows 11 Pro for enhanced security. Includes keyboard and mouse. 3-year Lenovo onsite warranty.

desktops.name: Acer Aspire TC-895
desktops.description: Acer Aspire TC-895 features an Intel Core i3-10100 processor, 8GB DDR4 RAM, and a 256GB SSD. Comes with Windows 11, Wi-Fi 6, multiple USB 3.1 and HDMI ports. Compact design with a modern black finish. Includes wired keyboard and mouse. 1-year warranty.

desktops.name: Apple iMac 24-inch M1
desktops.small_summary: Sleek all-in-one desktop with Apple M1 chip.
desktops.description: The iMac 24-inch features Apple's powerful M1 chip, 8GB unified memory, and a 256GB SSD. The stunning 4.5K Retina display delivers crisp visuals, and the 1080p FaceTime HD camera ensures high-quality video calls. Includes Magic Keyboard and Magic Mouse. Available in multiple colors. 1-year AppleCare warranty.

laptops.name: MacBook Air M2
laptops.small_summary: Ultra-thin laptop with Apple's latest M2 chip.
laptops.description: MacBook Air M2 features Apple's latest M2 chip with an 8-core CPU and 10-core GPU, offering exceptional speed and efficiency. The 13.6-inch Liquid Retina display provides stunning visuals with True Tone technology. Comes with 8GB unified memory and 256GB SSD storage, with options for expansion. It offers up to 18 hours of battery life, MagSafe 3 charging, and a 1080p FaceTime HD camera for crystal-clear video calls. Includes macOS Ventura, two Thunderbolt 4/USB 4 ports, a 3.5mm headphone jack, Wi-Fi 6, and Touch ID security. Available in Midnight, Starlight, Space Gray, and Silver. Covered by Appleâ€™s 1-year warranty with AppleCare+ options.

laptops.name: Dell XPS 13
laptops.small_summary: Ultra-thin laptop with premium build quality.
laptops.description: The Dell XPS 13 features a 13.4-inch InfinityEdge display, 11th Gen Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB RAM, and a 512GB SSD. With Windows 11, Wi-Fi 6, Bluetooth 5.1, Thunderbolt 4 ports, and an aluminum chassis, it's perfect for professionals and students. Comes with a backlit keyboard and fingerprint reader. 1-year Dell Premium Support included.

laptops.name: HP Spectre x360
laptops.description: HP Spectre x360 features a 13.5-inch OLED touchscreen, 12th Gen Intel Core i7, 16GB RAM, and a 1TB SSD. Offers a 360-degree hinge for tablet mode, Windows 11, Wi-Fi 6E, Bang & Olufsen speakers, and fingerprint security. Comes with a stylus and premium build. 1-year HP warranty.

laptops.name: Asus ROG Zephyrus G14
laptops.small_summary: Compact gaming laptop with powerful specs.
laptops.description: Asus ROG Zephyrus G14 features a 14-inch 165Hz QHD display, AMD Ryzen 9 6900HS, RTX 3060 GPU, 16GB DDR5 RAM, and a 1TB SSD. It has a backlit keyboard, ROG cooling, Dolby Atmos audio, and Wi-Fi 6E. Runs Windows 11. 2-year Asus warranty.

laptops.name: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon
laptops.small_summary: Business-class laptop with premium security features.
laptops.description: The ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 10 features a 14-inch 2.8K display, 12th Gen Intel Core i7, 32GB RAM, and a 1TB SSD. It includes a fingerprint scanner, IR camera for Windows Hello, 5G connectivity, Wi-Fi 6E, and a carbon-fiber chassis. Runs Windows 11 Pro. 3-year Lenovo warranty.

iphones.name: iPhone 15 Pro Max
iphones.small_summary: Apple's most advanced iPhone with A17 Pro chip.
iphones.description: The iPhone 15 Pro Max features a 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion technology for a smoother experience. It is powered by the A17 Pro chip, ensuring lightning-fast performance. The triple-camera system includes a 48MP main sensor, 5x telephoto zoom, and ultra-wide capabilities. Titanium frame makes it more durable and lighter. Comes with iOS 17, Dynamic Island, Always-On Display, USB-C port, and up to 1TB storage option. Includes Face ID for security. Water and dust resistance rated IP68. Battery life supports up to 29 hours of video playback. 1-year Apple warranty.

iphones.name: iPhone 14 Pro
iphones.small_summary: Pro camera system with Dynamic Island feature.
iphones.description: The iPhone 14 Pro sports a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion. It features Apple's A16 Bionic chip for powerful performance. The 48MP main camera captures stunning photos, while the ultra-wide and telephoto lenses offer versatility. Supports Always-On Display, Crash Detection, and Emergency SOS via satellite. Comes with iOS 16, Face ID, and up to 1TB of storage. IP68-rated water resistance and all-day battery life with MagSafe charging. 1-year Apple warranty.

iphones.name: iPhone 13
iphones.small_summary: A15 Bionic chip and dual-camera system.
iphones.description: The iPhone 13 features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display for bright and vibrant colors. It is powered by the A15 Bionic chip, providing fast performance and efficiency. The 12MP dual-camera system with sensor-shift stabilization enhances photography. Comes with iOS 15 (upgradeable), Face ID, 5G connectivity, and up to 512GB storage. Offers up to 19 hours of video playback. Water-resistant (IP68) and MagSafe compatible. 1-year Apple warranty.

iphones.name: iPhone SE (3rd Gen)
iphones.small_summary: Affordable iPhone with A15 Bionic chip.
iphones.description: The iPhone SE 3rd Gen retains the classic design with a 4.7-inch Retina HD display. Powered by the A15 Bionic chip, it offers smooth performance and efficiency. Comes with a single 12MP wide camera with Smart HDR 4. Features Touch ID, 5G connectivity, and iOS 16 support. Offers up to 15 hours of video playback. Water-resistant (IP67) and available in multiple colors. 1-year Apple warranty.

iphones.name: iPhone 12 Mini
iphones.description: The iPhone 12 Mini features a 5.4-inch Super Retina XDR display, making it one of the most compact iPhones with flagship performance. Powered by the A14 Bionic chip, it supports 5G for fast connectivity. Dual 12MP camera system with Night Mode enhances photography. Comes with iOS 14 (upgradeable), Face ID, MagSafe compatibility, and up to 256GB storage. Water and dust resistance (IP68) ensures durability. Battery life lasts up to 15 hours of video playback. 1-year Apple warranty.

cameras.name: Canon EOS R5
cameras.description: The Canon EOS R5 is a flagship mirrorless camera featuring a 45MP full-frame CMOS sensor, DIGIC X processor, and 8K video recording capability. It offers a Dual Pixel CMOS AF II system with 1,053 AF points, 20fps electronic shutter, and 5-axis in-body image stabilization. Built for professionals, it supports dual card slots (CFexpress & SD UHS-II), a 3.2-inch vari-angle touchscreen, and a high-resolution 5.76M-dot OLED EVF. Weather-sealed body, Wi-Fi & Bluetooth connectivity, and up to 500 shots per charge make it ideal for advanced photography and videography. 1-year Canon warranty.

cameras.name: Sony Alpha A7 IV
cameras.small_summary: Hybrid mirrorless camera with 33MP full-frame sensor.
cameras.description: The Sony Alpha A7 IV is a powerful hybrid mirrorless camera featuring a 33MP full-frame Exmor R sensor and BIONZ XR processor for superior image quality. It supports 4K 60p video recording, real-time Eye AF for humans and animals, and a 10fps continuous shooting mode. The camera is equipped with a 3-inch vari-angle LCD touchscreen, 5-axis IBIS, dual card slots, and advanced AI-based autofocus. Connectivity options include Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and USB-C. Weather-sealed body ensures durability for professional use. 1-year Sony warranty.

cameras.name: Nikon Z9
cameras.small_summary: Professional mirrorless camera with 8K video recording.
cameras.description: The Nikon Z9 is a professional-grade mirrorless camera designed for high-end photography and videography. It features a 45.7MP stacked CMOS sensor and EXPEED 7 processor for exceptional speed and image quality. The advanced autofocus system includes 493 AF points and real-time subject tracking. It supports 8K 30p video recording, 120fps burst shooting, and 5-axis in-body stabilization. The 3.2-inch tilting LCD, dual CFexpress card slots, and robust weather sealing make it ideal for demanding conditions. Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and GPS included. 1-year Nikon warranty.

cameras.name: Fujifilm X-T5
cameras.small_summary: APS-C mirrorless camera with classic controls.
cameras.description: The Fujifilm X-T5 features a 40.2MP APS-C X-Trans CMOS 5 HR sensor and X-Processor 5, delivering high-resolution images with fast processing. The camera supports 6.2K 30p and 4K 60p video recording, 15fps mechanical shutter, and a 5-axis in-body stabilization system. Classic manual dials, a high-resolution OLED EVF, and a tilting LCD screen provide a retro shooting experience. Compact, lightweight, and weather-sealed for outdoor use. Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity included. 1-year Fujifilm warranty.

cameras.name: Panasonic Lumix GH6
cameras.small_summary: Micro Four Thirds camera with 5.7K video recording.
cameras.description: The Panasonic Lumix GH6 is a high-end Micro Four Thirds mirrorless camera designed for videographers and content creators. It features a 25.2MP sensor, Venus Engine processor, and 5.7K 60p video recording. Advanced autofocus with AI-driven subject recognition, 7.5-stop image stabilization, and unlimited recording time make it ideal for professional work. Dual card slots, a fully articulating touchscreen, and advanced heat dissipation allow for extended shooting. Wi-Fi and Bluetooth included. 1-year Panasonic warranty.

mp3_players.name: Apple iPod Touch (7th Generation)
mp3_players.small_summary: Portable media player with a 4-inch Retina display.
mp3_players.description: The Apple iPod Touch (7th Generation) is a powerful and portable media player featuring a 4-inch Retina display, A10 Fusion chip, and up to 256GB of storage. It supports Apple Music, App Store applications, and gaming with AR capabilities. Includes an 8MP rear camera, FaceTime HD front camera, and up to 40 hours of audio playback. Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity ensure seamless streaming and sharing. Ideal for music lovers, kids, and casual gamers. 1-year Apple warranty included.

mp3_players.name: Sony Walkman NW-A105
mp3_players.description: The Sony Walkman NW-A105 is a premium high-resolution music player with a 3.6-inch touchscreen and Android OS for streaming apps. It supports Hi-Res Audio, DSEE HX upscaling, and LDAC for superior sound quality. 16GB internal storage (expandable via microSD), Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and USB-C connectivity make it a versatile audio device. Compact and stylish aluminum body with up to 26 hours of battery life. 1-year Sony warranty included.

mp3_players.name: SanDisk Clip Sport Plus
mp3_players.small_summary: Compact and water-resistant MP3 player for workouts.
mp3_players.description: The SanDisk Clip Sport Plus is a lightweight, water-resistant MP3 player designed for active users. Features 16GB internal storage, Bluetooth connectivity, and an FM radio tuner. The clip-on design ensures secure placement during workouts. Supports MP3, WMA, and AAC file formats. Up to 20 hours of battery life per charge. Durable and easy to use with a 1.44-inch display. 1-year SanDisk warranty included.

mp3_players.name: FiiO M11 Plus LTD
mp3_players.small_summary: High-fidelity digital audio player with dual DAC chips.
mp3_players.description: The FiiO M11 Plus LTD is an audiophile-grade digital audio player with dual AK4497 DAC chips for outstanding sound clarity. It features a 5.5-inch touchscreen, Snapdragon 660 processor, and Android OS for seamless streaming. Supports Hi-Res Audio, DSD256, and MQA decoding. 64GB internal storage, microSD expansion, and balanced 2.5mm/4.4mm outputs. Long-lasting battery with fast charging. 1-year FiiO warranty included.

mp3_players.name: Cowon Plenue D3
mp3_players.small_summary: Premium lossless music player with exceptional battery life.
mp3_players.description: The Cowon Plenue D3 is a high-end portable music player designed for audiophiles. It features a dual DAC setup for superior sound quality, support for FLAC, WAV, MP3, and other lossless formats, and a sleek aluminum design. 64GB internal storage, expandable via microSD. Offers up to 45 hours of continuous playback. 2.8-inch touchscreen for easy navigation. 1-year Cowon warranty included.
